caption.title: Genetic constructs used in this study.

tr.td: UAS promoter driving Citrine expression SPARK reporter construct
UAS promoter driving luciferase expression SPARK reporter construct
Myc: EQKLISEEDL SPARK protease construct for transient expression with Myc epitope tag
Hygromycin selection marker HAx2: YPYDVPDYAYPYDVPDYA SPARK protease construct for stable integration
HAx2: YPYDVPDYAYPYDVPDYA SPARK protease construct for transient expression with HA epitope tag
TEVcs: ENLYFQM FLAG: DYKDDDDK V5: GKPIPNPLLGLDST SPARK GPCR (β2AR) construct
Myc: EQKLISEEDL Used in SPARK specificity experiment (Figure 1E)
TEVcs: ENLYFQM FLAG: DYKDDDDK V5: GKPIPNPLLGLDST Used in SPARK specificity experiment (Figure 1E)
Used in arrestin translocation experiment (Figure 1—figure supplement 2A)

TEVcs(Q): ENLYFQQ SPARK GPCR (β2AR) construct with alternative TEVp cleavage site
